thread.title: Check out list of India's richest cities and their total wealth
thread.title_full: Check out list of India's richest cities and their total wealth

title: Check out list of India's richest cities and their total wealth
text:
Check out list of India's richest cities and their total wealth By Zee Media Bureau   10:35 0 
New Delhi: India's financial capital Mumbai, which is home to 46,000 millionaires and 28 billionaires, is the richest Indian city with a total wealth of USD 820 billion, says a report. 

According to New World Wealth, Mumbai is the richest city in the country followed by Delhi and Bengaluru in the second and third place, respectively. 
Here are eight Indian cities and their wealth 
Mumbai: Home to 46,000 millionaires and 28 billionaires with a total wealth of USD 820 billion 
Delhi: Home to 23,000 millionaires and 18 billionaires with a total wealth of USD 450 billion 
Bengaluru: Home to 7,700 millionaires and 8 billionaires with a total wealth of USD 320 billion. 
Hyderabad: Home to 9,000 millionaires and 6 billionaires with a total wealth of USD 310 billion. 
Kolkata : Home to 9,600 millionaires and 4 billionaires with a total wealth of USD 290 billion. 
Pune : Home to 4,500 millionaires and 5 billionaires with a total wealth of USD 180 billion. 
Chennai : Home to 4,000 millionaires and 2 billionaires with a total wealth of USD 110 billion.
